评论详情: This 2-piece sweatshirt and shorts set is by far the best material I’ve ever had! It’s super soft, durable, and definitely built to last a lifetime. The fit is perfect and so comfortable for everyday wear. Definitely worth every penny I’m so happy with this purchase. Highly recommend for anyone looking for style, comfort, and quality!

评论概述: Stylish, comfortable set for everyday living!
评论详情: This set is a new staple in my wardrobe! It’s soft, warm, amazing quality and fits great! For reference I got the medium and am a size 10-12. The color is different from any other sets I’ve seen available making it stand out. The fabric is medium weight and washes with no pilling or discoloration. I can wear the top and bottom together or separate a giving it more  versatility and options for my everyday wear💁🏼‍♀️

I adore this line! Matched set however it is fleece so the shorts wrinkles a bit. They fit big around the thighs but not huge. Forgiving and not short shorts. Mid thigh. Comfortable. Beautiful set. Pockets. 5 feet 4, 134. Size S. Easily inter change able. Washes well. Be careful as the material is fleece and may shed in dryer! Good buy for Spring/cool Summer/Fall in Midwest.
This set is so cute, comfortable and soft! The fit is spot on!

I ordered this set on a limited time deal in the khaki color.  I love the top but the shorts do not match.  They are a darker color.  I’m going to keep it to wear as separates because the price was so good.  Both pieces are very warm & comfortable, just sad that they can’t be worn together.

This is one of the best quality sets I’ve bought lately. The material is thick and the color is brilliant! I’m 5’6” 127 I ordered a medium. Probably should have sized down. It’s a little big, but will be comfy to lounge around in. I wanted it for running around. Which I will still do… I’ll let you know if it’s shrinks a little. But I would size down if you want a closer fit to your size. I bought the green. It’s Gucci green… I love it! Highly recommend this set! Also arrived super fast! 2 days!
Great fit! Super comfy material. Great quality! I want more of these!

I  was a bit worried ordering this product. Some reviews said to size up and some said to size down. I took my chances and ordered a size down. I’m 5ft and 180 pounds and ordered a medium. It fits great!!! So comfy and light. Not too bulky like other sweaters. Definitely ordering more colors in medium.

The blue is so pretty. The fabric quality looks much more expensive than it is. The fit seemed true to size. However, I ended up returning as the shorts legs were a little wide for me. I also decided I would probably not be wearing shorts with a sweatshirt. Would have kept if they were sweatpants instead.  Other than this issue, I fully recommend!

I love that I can throw this on with some sneakers and look cute while running errands. I always get compliments when I wear it. It’s super soft and comfy. My only complaint is that the zipper sticks straight up instead of laying down and can poke me on the underneath side of my chin.
when I do errands, I put this set on and get a lot of compliments on how cute is! highly recommend, super comfortable and everytime you wash it, it doesn't shrink and just stays the same

评论概述: Just like that picture so I though!
评论详情: This one came defective because when I first put it on I never tired in the zipper. Mind you in live in Florida but work from home and my husband keeps the house freezing and just to run errand like taking and picking up my kids- when it’s still cool out temperature wise, for me it was perfect. Until I went to hang it up (after a few hours of use) and I couldn’t zipper it. I’m so mad because I can’t even return it! I personally don’t sweat so I had not washed it before noticing the zipper was damaged for those that will ask that. But any case it is a very thick 2 piece set. I would we’re together or separate, now it’s just a waste of money I’m going to have to give away. Very sadden because I’ve bought from only this brand on Amazon specifically because they are so good!! You can tell I just took it out and though it own to take the kids here. Anyway if you don’t get Defective one it’s worth it the 5star

评论概述: Sweatshirt is nice, bulky waist band on the shorts
评论详情: I have bought this sweatshirt short set in several colors. All of the colors are very nice and as advertised. Except, the red is actually a dark pink. If you want a true red, this is not it. Also the shorts are not the best. The shorts have a very thick waist band. The waist band has 3 rows of bulky sweatshirt material stitched. If the waist band was not so bulky and uncomfortable, I might wear them. I doubt I will ever wear them though and will probably donate them instead. I do like the sweatshirts a lot. They are soft and the half zip up works well. I got a size small and it fits like a standard large. I probably could have gotten the extra small, but I like the oversized look.
I am 4’11 and weigh 104lbs I purchased this in a size xs, but it was too big!  It looked frumpy on me and was both too wide and too long.
This wish it was a little better quLity
I am 5’3 and 165 and the large fits perfectly! The material is soft and not too thick. Definitely going to order another color.

I love the color and the softness of the fabric especially after laundering the first time. I ordered the XL giving me plenty of room, but if you like a slimmer fit, you may want to consider purchasing one size down.
Can’t go wrong with Annrabess! Great loose fit and wonderful material. Bought 3 colors for my recent vacation in the mountains and was perfect for those cool, crisp mornings.

This is very comfortable. It is thick and decent quality. I am 5'3, 144lbs, athletic build. The shorts are not too short and the pullover fits well. I ordered a size small. I ordered the color grey, color is true to photos.

I have had this set for a couple months now and it has held up very well- no pillage at all and I do put this in the dryer (delicate cycle). Honestly the fabric still looks new.  I am 5'2", 120lbs, 32DD, small/medium hips, and I got a size small.  The top is oversized- at first I thought it was too big because I'm not use to wearing oversized, but after giving it a shot I really like it.  Bottoms feel like a normal small- at times even a bit snug on the waist. If you have larger hips the bottoms could potentially feel tight. Depending on body types it may be difficult to find the right size in this.  Overall, good quality, cute, comfy and cozy set, keeps you warm but not sweaty.  I'd buy again.

Thick and cozy Very nice quality and comfort. However, I’m glad I didn’t pay full price because the bottoms felt a tad bit smaller size wise than the top. Will definitely be re-wearing the top in multiple manners.
Soft ,thick ,  cozy warm , great color .  Shorts legs seem a little large for a medium but for the money a really cute outfit !
Favorite set, however, arms are a little on the short side. But not short enough to size up.
This sweat short set is super cute.. Im 5'2" 129lbs. I bought a small & the top fit me big but the shorts were fine.  It is thick and comfortable. Nice to wear on a fresh fall day. Love the color too
I absolutely love this set. I wear the shorts often by themselves. They are so cute, oversized, and comfy. The sweatshirt sleeves are a bit short for my long arms, but otherwise it’s super cozy.
I love this set! I wear it all the time. Very thick fabric.

评论概述: Comfy, cute, warm, great fabric , washes perfectly, good value!!
评论详情: For me... These two matching pieces are great for me.  I like the texture.. color . Sizing and comfort.  The set is just the right weight..not too heavy (too warm). and it has been comfy transitioning from winter to spring!  love the draw string shorts.. good quality.. thinking of buying a second set.. choosing a color that is offered now that I bought the black!!

评论概述: Be Mindful of the colors you choose
评论详情: Thick fabric which I appreciate. Definitely will keep you warm during the cooler months, but be mindful of the colors you pick. I purchased the deep navy and burnt orange. Both colors appears dull in comparison to other lounge set I purchased in the same colors.
It’s so soft!! It is almost exactly what I was hoping it would be like. The only down side I have is that the leg holes on the shorts are very large compared to my leg size.
Love the top, perfect slouchy fit, shorts are on the shorter inseam side

I ordered a medium and it fit but I returned it. The fabric on this set is extremely heavy which doesn’t make sense to me because it’s a hoodie jacket with matching shorts. If it is warm enough to wear shorts you will be overheating with the warmth of this fabric. Who wears shorts when it’s cold outside? I guess if you do you might like this but it was a definite no for me.

I ordered 2 sets. One was in seller packaging and the other generic plastic bag. Both sets had tags. The one in generic plastic bag had ink on the back of the collar. When I washed that set the tie on the shorts started unraveling. I tied it so it wouldn’t continue raveling. The other set was fine. They are otherwise good quality. Agree that sets would look better with matching zipper instead of black.

I bought this in a medium and it fits perfect! I’m 5’ 4” / 135lbs. Just baggy enough on top to not look like I’m swimming in it and the shorts are super comfortable. Thinking of buying another set in a different color.

This is so soft and comfy. Well worth the cost. I’d buy it again.

I bought this to wear on winter vacation in Florida and it is perfect!  I love the color, the fit, and the material.  It’s soft and cozy for their cool mornings but can wear all day with a t-shirt.  Washes well too.

I just tried this on but the fit is great and the material quality seems good.

I should’ve bought all the colors when it was on sale! lol This set is so soft and warm and comfortable. The quality is great. It’s enough of an oversized fit but not so huge. For reference, I’m 5’2 and 120 lbs and I bought a small. Love this set.

I gave this as a gift and the quality is amazing! It doesn’t feel cheap and the color looks expensive. It’s not thin, but a thicker material, but not so heavy that it would be hot. Great buy! Highly recommend. I’m also going to get this for myself.
Perfect fit, perfect comfort. Great color & style.

I ordered a size too big but for sure going to be getting the correct size! It is extremely comfortable and soft. The shorts fit perfectly for covering up.

Omg, so in love with the way it feels on my body! So cozy and stylish. Love it 😍

评论概述: So nice I bought it twice!
评论详情: Bought this after being influenced! I purchased the Kelly Green color for myself which is very vibrant. Then went back and got the black for my mom as a present. It is definitely a great fit for people who are large chested with small hips. The shirt being oversized definitely makes it great for that body shape. It is on the thicker side, which is great for a cool fall night.
This is very comfortable and true to size. I will be purchasing other colors.
Surprised at the quality.  It’s loose fitting but not too baggy very comfortable.  The shorts are also comfy.  I recommend for a casual look that looks pulled together.
Great buy! The material is soft , warm , thick and cozy . I bought it in green and the color is vibrant  and beautiful .
I absolutely love this set the material is nice and thick the shorts fit nice and I would say it’s true to size

I ordered this outfit in several (approx) colors, and they were all very beautiful and as picked online. The outfit is extremely comfy and something that can be used for lounging, running errands, picking up the kiddos from school, or grabbing lunch with friends.  Be warned, however, that it is also very thick. For us Texans that have warm weather through mid-December, it’s not the most practical piece, but for cooler-climates, this is definitely a comfy-casual fall staple.
Great quality appearance is beautiful, comfortable and value for your money I must buy
I will be ordering more in others colors. Fit is fantastic! Flattering on any body shape. Front zip is stylish and modern not " sportswear" looking. Very versatile.
Absolutely love this little outfit! So good! Great quality and for the price it was even better! Fits true to size! Soooo good! 10/10!!
Size down for a perfect fit material is great and feels great also

I rarely leave reviews but I am sooo happy to purchase this set. Omg! It exceeded expectations! I would say this is the closest to a Lululemon half zip jackets. Quality is superb! Fabric feels nice and cozy. In regards to the sizing if you’re medium. I would size down. My stats are 36c, I also have bigger arms. 29 in for waist. 5’0 ft tall. It looks oversized to me with size small.
I love the color,got the violet and it’s so vibrant! Very roomy and comfortable set. Superb quality and great fleece material. I loved it so much I got another color!
True to size, comfortable, and color as shown. Would highly recommend.

very comfy for travel!
Got it for my friend as a gift and she loves it! Super soft and thick material.
I wore this for travel, its very light and comfortable to wear
Very happy with this set. I bought it in black but will be buying another set in the brown. The fit and fabric is better than I expected.

Really nice shorts  and sweatshirt set…  nice material and after washing turned out great love it

Something to wear around the house and not be embarassed to answer the door in. Have other sweat sets from this brand but be repurchasing THIS style.

I really enjoyed this sweat suit. The color is just like the picture. The material is very thick and warm for the cold weather. I brought this suit for the airport and it kept me very warm and comfortable for my long hours of traveling. Definitely will be purchasing more.
Love it! Cute, warm and sporty! Definitely buying more colors!

Ordered my normal size 16/xlg in the black set and it fit perfectly! Super cute. Super comfy. It's almost a fleece material inside both the top and bottom, so it's extremely soft and the outside feels buttery as well. Haven't washed yet, hopefully it's stays true on the color and doesn't shrink.

The color is beautiful! Great quality set. Only issue was the medium was a little too big for me. Returning for a small but excited to wear. Will fit comfortably and true to size if you want a relaxed look. I prefer a more tailored fit so sizing down.

Fits great! So soft and cozy. I got an XL I’m 5’7 230lb for reference and fits loosely in the top for a nice over size look and shorts fit just right not tight at all.
